data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: The successful among us delay gratification. The successful among us bargain with the future.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: Start to stop doing what you know to be wrong.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: Expedience is the following of blind impulse. It’s short-term gain. It’s narrow, and selfish.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: What worked yesterday will not necessarily work today.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: You should never sacrifice what you could be for what you are.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: If you think tough men are dangerous, wait until you see what weak men are capable of.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: There are two major reasons for resentment: being taken advantage of (or allowing yourself to be taken advantage of), or whiny refusal to adopt responsibility and grow up.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: Put the things you can control in order. Repair what is in disorder, and make what is already good better.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: To journey happily may well be better than to arrive successfully.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: What you aim at determines what you see.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: Walk tall and gaze forthrightly ahead. Dare to be dangerous.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: You have to be a monster to stay alive.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: Be grateful in spite of your suffering.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: There are some games you don’t get to play unless you are all in.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: Set your house in perfect order before you criticize the world.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: Face the demands of life voluntarily. Respond to a challenge, instead of bracing for catastrophe.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: The way that you make people resilient is by voluntarily exposing them to things that they are afraid of and that make them uncomfortable.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: Compare yourself to who you were yesterday, not to who someone else is today.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: The successful among us delay gratification and bargain with the future.

data.author: Jordan Peterson
data.quote: Work as hard as you possibly can on at least one thing and see what happens.
